mapper.select: select * from EV_REVIEW r inner join EV_MEMBER m using(USER_ID) where USER_ID= #{userId}
mapper.update: update EV_REVIEW set REV_CONTENT = #{cont} where REV_ID = #{revId}
update EV_MEMBER set NICKNAME=#{nickname}, PW=#{pw}, CELL=#{cell} where USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail}
update EV_MEMBER set VL_ID=#{vLevel} where USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail}
mapper.select: select * from EV_CALENDAR where USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} and C_DATE like #{date}
select * from (select substr(C_DATE, 6, 2) month, EV_CALENDAR.* from EV_CALENDAR where USER_ID = #{userId}) v where v.month like (select concat('%', #{month}, '%'))
mapper.update: update EV_CALENDAR set ICON=#{icon}, E_MENU=#{cMenu}, C_PRICE=${cPrice}, C_CONT=#{cCont} where USER_ID=#{userId} and C_DATE=#{cDate}
mapper.delete: delete from EV_CALENDAR where USER_ID=#{userId} and C_DATE=#{cDate}
